snippet: At least 12 people were injured when the police clashed with protesters in Maribor on Monday in the latest of a series of rallies.
abstract: At least 12 people are injured when Slovenian police clash with protesters in Maribor, country's second largest city, in latest of series of rallies against budget cuts and graft.
lead_paragraph: At least 12 people were injured when the police clashed with protesters in Maribor on Monday in the latest of a series of rallies.

headline.main: Slovenian Protesters Denounce Graft and Budget Cuts
headline.print_headline: Slovenia: Protesters Denounce Graft and Budget Cuts
